# Project Context (llms.txt)

> **Root Reference for AI Agents**
> This file maps the core system components for the Orchestrated System of Agents (OSA).

## ðŸ“‚ Core System Files

| Component | File | Description |
|-----------|------|-------------|
| **Architecture** | [OSA.toon](OSA.toon) | **PRIMARY SOURCE OF TRUTH**. Execution patterns, agent roles, and workflow standards. |
| **State** | [MEMORY.toon](MEMORY.toon) | **SHARED MEMORY**. Session context and facts in TOON format. |
| **Requirements** | [PRD.toon](PRD.toon) | **PRODUCT SPECS**. Features and status in TOON format. |
| **Tasks** | [TODO.toon](TODO.toon) | **WORK QUEUE**. Atomic, testable tasks for the Gemini Loop to process. |
| **Memory** | [TOON.md](TOON.md) | **PROTOCOL**. Token-Oriented Object Notation specification. |

## ðŸ”„ Orchestration (Gemini Loop)

For autonomous loop instructions, refer to:
- [OSA.md](OSA.md)

## ðŸš€ Quick Start for LLMs

1. **READ** `OSA.md` to understand your role and constraints.
2. **SYNC** with the shared state file to load current context.
3. **CHECK** `TODO.md` for pending tasks.
4. **EXECUTE** using the patterns defined in `OSA.md`.
